article_title: Preservationist plans restoration of Joseph Nichols Tavern in Lynchburg
article_text:

og.description: William W. Holt, 71, stood in one of the back rooms of the Joseph Nichols Tavern, a tricorner hat perched atop his head, looking at the blue walls that surrounded him, a frown upon his face.
